reason: Duplicate of q_4_0024. Question ('직무상 의무의 정의') is semantically identical to q_4_0024 ('직무상 의무의 개념'). Answer is word-for-word identical.

Question asks about 양정 기준 (sentencing/measurement criteria) for 직무상 의무, but the answer contains no 양정 기준 information. Answer is a generic dump identical to q_4_0024/0025, ignoring the specific question.
Duplicate answer identical to q_4_0024/0025/0027. Question asks specifically about 복종의 의무 in detail, but answer generically covers both 성실의무 and 복종의 의무 without additional depth.
Question asks about consequences of mishandling duties ('잘못 처리하면 어떤 문제가 생기나요'), but the answer just lists the basic duties without mentioning any consequences. Question-answer mismatch.
Duplicate answer identical to q_4_0016/0017/0018/0019/0033 (교직원 임무 dump). While the question is more reasonable than some others, the answer is reused verbatim across 6+ entries.

Grammar error in question: '의무과' should be '의무와' (의무 has no batchim, requires 와 not 과). Question asks about 참고 서식 (reference forms) but answer contains no form information. Duplicate answer with q_4_0024 group.
Duplicate answer identical to q_4_0024/0025/0027/0029/0036/0038. Question asks about 세부 기준 (detailed criteria) but answer provides only the same general overview.
Duplicate answer identical to q_4_0024/0025/0027/0029/0036/0037. No unique value compared to the other entries covering the same source text.
Meaningful question about 복무일반 overview. Answer accurately covers 관련 법규 (7 laws) and 교직원의 임무, all verified on page 259. Source text matches lines 3-21 of the markdown.
Duplicate of q_4_0039: near-identical answer. Question asks 'how laws are applied' (어떻게 적용되나요) but answer merely lists the laws without explaining application. Question-answer mismatch.
